rules_text: [i]Finale –[/i] Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent may sacrifice a creature or discard a card. If they don't, you draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]Put an end to these meaningless expeditions to the ruins. They cause naught but sorrow and distress.[/i]
notes: Flavor: Wishes to stop the murmur
